mapper.select: SELECT A.duty_board_id ,A.duty_board_title ,A.duty_board_content ,A.duty_board_readcnt ,A.duty_board_create_dt ,A.duty_board_update_dt ,A.duty_updater_id ,A.duty_board_end_dt ,A.emp_writer_id ,B.emp_name ,A.duty_board_security FROM duty A JOIN emp B ON A.emp_writer_id=B.emp_id WHERE A.duty_board_id = #{duty_Board_Id}
